name: Santa's Risky Ride
description:
Santa's Risky Ride

Play as Santa Claus as he slides down a snowy mountain on his sled, collecting bonus points as you go. The objective of the game is to get the highest score on the leaderboard by traveling the furthest distance down the hill. Challenge your friends and family to see who can get the highest score and have a great time playing this holiday-themed christmas game!

Controls
  • A: to steer left
  • D: to steer right
  • W: to roll forward
  • S: to roll backward
